sentences.english: With the eyes nine-tenths closed, focus at the tip of your nose.
sentences.chinese: 眼睛閉上十分之九，注意力集中在鼻尖。

sentences.english: Then sink to your nose in a bubble bath?
sentences.chinese: 當你洗泡泡浴時泡沫會弄到鼻尖上嗎？

sentences.english: This is the case to reduce the nasal dorsum and adjust the nasal tip slightly.
sentences.chinese: 這是一例縮小鼻背和略調整鼻尖的例子。

sentences.english: It stings the toes and bites the nose.
sentences.chinese: 它吹疼了我的腳趾和鼻尖。

sentences.english: In rhinoplasty, numerous surgical techniques have been proposed to shape the tip cartilages.
sentences.chinese: 在鼻整形術中已有許多被用於鼻尖軟骨塑形的技術。

sentences.english: The cartilaginous framework of the tip has been described as a tripod.
sentences.chinese: 鼻尖的軟骨支架可以看成一個三腳架。

sentences.english: Snowflakes that stay on my nose and eyelashes.
sentences.chinese: 雪花片片落在鼻尖，落在睫毛上。

sentences.english: These studies have also shown that defatting may jeopardize the nasal tip supply.
sentences.chinese: 這些研究還表明，脂肪去除可能會危及鼻尖血供。

sentences.english: Can you balance a stick on the end of your nose?
sentences.chinese: 你能把一根棍子放在你的鼻尖上使之保持平衡嗎？

sentences.english: The bridge of the muzzle is straight. Muzzle tapers slightly from stop to nose tip.
sentences.chinese: 鼻樑很直，從止部到鼻尖成輕微的錐形。

sentences.english: If you look at the end of your nose, your eyes converge.
sentences.chinese: 如果你看着你的鼻尖，你的兩眼就向一點集中。

sentences.english: A pair of spectacles is perched near the end of his nose.
sentences.chinese: 一副眼鏡架在他的鼻尖上。

sentences.english: A pair of spectacles was perched near the end of his nose.
sentences.chinese: 一副眼鏡架在他的鼻尖上。

sentences.english: Objective To introduce the experience of frontonasal flap for reconstructing the nasal tip defects.
sentences.chinese: 目的介紹額鼻皮瓣在鼻尖部缺損修復中的應用經驗。

sentences.english: Objective To introduce the method and experience of the sub-unit principle of nasal tip in rhinoplasty .
sentences.chinese: 目的介紹以亞單位原則指導鼻尖成形術的方法和經驗。

definition: the wing of the nose/ala nasi
temple (on the sides of human head)
